text: Can you help me change my password?
Sure, I can definitely help with that. Before we begin, please provide me with your username and old password.
My username is user2 and my old password is user2pass.
Thanks, I also need to authenticate your account by getting a token. One moment please.
Okay, I have successfully obtained the token. Now, what would you like your new password to be?
Great, I will now change your password.
Done! Your password has been successfully modified.
